### line-up equations {-}


\begin{equation} \label{eq1}
\begin{split}
E[d_t] & = EE[d_t|y_t] \\
 & = E[x\hat{\beta_t}|y_t] \\
 & = xE[\hat{\beta_t}|y_t] \\
 & = xE[(x^Tx)^{-1}x^Td_t|y_t] \\
 & = x(x^Tx)^{-1}x^TE[d_t|y_t] \\
 & = x(x^Tx)^{-1}x^TE[y_t + \xi_t] \\
 & = x(x^Tx)^{-1}x^T[x\hat{\beta_t} + 0] \\
 & = x\hat{\beta_t}
\end{split}
\end{equation}
